name: MySpaControl
0:
”Alexa, ask my spa control to turn on the lights”
”Alexa, ask my spa control to start my spa”
”Alexa, ask my spa control to stop my spa”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my spa control
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa can help you with some specific questions about your Gecko Alliance’s components and their functionalities. For example, you can say, Alexa, ask my spa control what is the OH error.”

By adding Alexa to your spa equipped with the in.touch 2 from Gecko Alliance, you will be able to control your spa with voice commands. If you want to set your water care in the “away from home” mode, before heading out for vacation, simply say, “Alexa, ask my spa control to set my water care to away from home.” You have to use your existing login and password from your mobile app to control your spa with Alexa.

Alexa skills will improve in the future. For more information and new stuff, please visit https://geckointouch.com/vocal-assistant/
